item.description:
Oktoberfest in Bethel!
This is an event for all of the German Meetup groups in Connecticut, New York usw.
It will be outside under a tent. A bit of Munich in Connecticut!
They take only CASH- nur Bargeld- keine Kreditkarten! Keine ATMmaschine
There will be live German music, the beers include Spaten Oktoberfest, Hofbr√§uhaus Dunkel und Weissbier,Radberger Pilsner. You can check out the details on their website.
Please RSVP by 9AM on that day so we will be able to arrange how to find you.
Danke!
item.how_to_find_us: After you RSVP "yes" you will be sent a cellphone number.
item.name: Oktoberfest at the Old Heidelberg Restaurant
